page.title: 18TRANSPORT
page.content:
TRANSPORT STANTON HARCOURT
{ROADS }The B4449 passes through the area, with a few minor country lanes leaving the main road.
{BUSES} There is one bus a day to Oxford it leaves the villages at about 8 am. A bus returns to the village from Oxford arriving at 6.15 pm.
There is a bus on Thursday and Saturday which goes to Witney. It leaves the village at 0910 and returns from Witney ay 1210. These times are the same on both days.
These buses are part of the rural West Oxfordshire service and go through many villages on their route.
